item.title: carrie add a quote by Sylvia Plath
item.description: "Kiss me, and you will see how important I am." -- Sylvia Plath

item.title: carrie add a quote by A.A. Milne
carrie add a quote by A.A. Milne
item.description: "If ever there is tomorrow when we're not together... there is something you must always remember. You are braver than you believe, stronger than you seem, and smarter than you think. But the most important thing is, even if we're apart... I'll always be with you." -- A.A. Milne

item.title: carrie add a quote by A.A. Milne
item.description: "You can't stay in your corner of the Forest waiting for others to come to you. You have to go to them sometimes." -- A.A. Milne

item.title: carrie add a quote by A.A. Milne
item.description: "Don't underestimate the value of Doing Nothing, of just going along, listening to all the things you can't hear, and not bothering." -- A.A. Milne

item.title: carrie add a quote by A.A. Milne
item.description: "Friendship," said Christopher Robin, "is a very comforting thing to have." -- A.A. Milne

item.title: carrie add a quote by Joyce Carol Oates
item.description: "I never change, I simply become more myself." -- Joyce Carol Oates

item.title: carrie add a quote by Joyce Carol Oates
item.description: "In love there are two things - bodies and words. " -- Joyce Carol Oates

item.title: carrie add a quote by Joyce Carol Oates, ed.
item.description: "The best revenge is living well without you. " -- Joyce Carol Oates, ed.

item.title: carrie add a quote by E.E. Cummings
item.description:
"I carry your heart with me (I carry it in my heart)I am never without it (anywhere I go you go,my dear; and whatever is done by only me is your doing,my darling) I fear no fate (for you are my fate,my sweet)I want no world (for beautiful you are my world,my true) and it's you are whatever a moon has always meant and whatever a sun will always sing is you
here is the deepest secret nobody knows (here is the root of the root and the bud of the bud and the sky of the sky of a tree called life; which grows higher than the soul can hope or mind can hide) and this is the wonder that's keeping the stars apart
I carry your heart (I carry it in my heart)" -- E.E. Cummings

item.title: carrie add a quote by Sylvia Plath
item.description: "Can you understand? Someone, somewhere, can you understand me a little, love me a little? For all my despair, for all my ideals, for all that - I love life. But it is hard, and I have so much - so very much to learn." -- Sylvia Plath

item.title: carrie add a quote by Sylvia Plath
item.description: "Here I am, a bundle of past recollections and future dreams, knotted up in a reasonably attractive bundle of flesh. I remember what this flesh has gone through; I dream of what it may go through." -- Sylvia Plath

item.title: carrie add a quote by Sylvia Plath
item.description: "I desire the things that will destroy me in the end." -- Sylvia Plath

item.title: carrie add a quote by Sylvia Plath
item.description: "Wear your heart on your skin in this life." -- Sylvia Plath

item.title: carrie add a quote by Anne Rice
item.description: "Evil is always possible. And goodness is eternally difficult." -- Anne Rice

item.title: carrie add a quote by Anne Rice
item.description: "None of us really changes over time. We only become more fully what we are." -- Anne Rice
